rows.label: tlk41700172_03_msg0001
rows.name:
When the Invidian and Superbian armies
came to visit, we made sure they got
to see our protests in full swing.

rows.label: tlk41700172_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Practically all Blades are maintained
in Acedia. There has to be some dissent
about that among their ranks.

rows.label: tlk41700172_03_msg0003
rows.name:
You're a Driver. You agree with me,
don't you? We can't just let another
country lord it over us like this!
